data.value: The CRC value of a program may not be zero.

data.name: UserSpecifiedProgramInformation_CreatedWithInvalidCRCMessage
data.value: A nonzero CRC value is necessary to create a Program Information entry.

data.name: UserSpecifiedProgramInformation_CreatedWithInvalidSource
data.value: Attempted to modify an invalid Program Information entry.

data.name: XmlRomInformationColumnConverter_IncompatibleConverterFormat
data.value: The converter for column '{0}' expected data type '{1}' but received a result of type '{2}'.
data.comment: {0}: name of the column; {1} exepected data type; {2} actual data type

data.name: XmlRomInformationColumnConverter_InvalidColumnFormat
data.value: The column named '{0}' is not supported.
data.comment: {0}: name of the column in the rominfo database

data.name: XmlRomInformationColumnConverter_InvalidConverterFormat
data.value: Unable to locate data converter for column '{0}'.
data.comment: {0}: name of the column in the rominfo database

data.name: AdditionalVendorInfoWebsite_Format
data.value: Website for {0}: {1}
data.comment: {0} a vendor name; {1} a website URL

data.name: InvalidDataBlockChecksumFormat
data.comment: {0}: expected checksum value; {1}: actual checksum value

data.name: InvalidLuigiHeaderSizeFormat
data.value: Invalid LUIGI header size: {0}
data.comment: {0}: size of the header that was read

data.name: ConfigurableFeature_InvalidWriteOperationMessageFormat

data.comment: {0} is the localized name of a configurable feature
